Read signatures" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="191" y="210" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LI3zIMZ0R0Q-ge_Y4rr0-6" value="2. Read an artifact as OCI image layout" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="230" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IC3ppNx3RwLCquvJwR_z-1" value="OCSP responder" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontColor=#000000;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="271" y="425" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IC3ppNx3RwLCquvJwR_z-2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="IC3ppNx3RwLCquvJwR_z-1" target="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="350" y="280" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="450" y="280" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IC3ppNx3RwLCquvJwR_z-3" value="7.
